Module hanyaeger.api

Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DimensionsProvider
    Implementing the DimensionsProvider interface exposes the DimensionsProvider.getWidth() and DimensionsProvider.getHeight() methods.
    EntityCollectionSupplier
    Provide a EntityCollectionSupplier.getEntityCollection() that returns an instance of \.
    EntitySpawnerContainer
    When implementing this interface, the EntitySpawnerContainer.setupEntitySpawners() method needs to be implemented.
    EntitySpawnerListProvider
    Implementing the EntitySpawnerListProvider interface guarantees that a List of instances of EntitySpawner is available.
    SupplierProvider
    Provide a SupplierProvider.getEntitySupplier() that returns an instance of EntitySupplier.
    YaegerScene
    A YaegerScene encapsulates a scene or level from a Yaeger Game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicScene
    Instantiate a new DynamicScene.
    SceneCollection
    A SceneCollection contains all instances of YaegerScene that are part of a Game.
    StaticScene
    A StaticScene is the abstract superclass of all scenes that do not require a Game Loop.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SceneBorder
    Since a YaegerScene is always rectangular shaped, it has fout borders, being the SceneBorder.TOP, SceneBorder.RIGHT, SceneBorder.BOTTOM and SceneBorder.LEFT.
